Class Balls

  • java.lang.Object
    • christmastree.ChrismasTree
      • christmastree.Decorator
        • christmastree.Balls

  • public class Balls
extends Decorator
    This class extendes the Decorator to add the specificity of a ball.
    Author:
    Yassine

    • Constructor Detail

      • Balls

        public Balls(ChrismasTree treeDecorator)
        This class adds balls in a christmasTree.
        Parameters:
        treeDecorator - the christmasTree to be augmented with the decorator

      • Balls

        public Balls(String color,
             String description,
             double price,
             String material,
             String size,
             ChrismasTree treeDecorator)
        this class decorated a christmas with a personnalized ball.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the ball
        description - to be augmented with values from this method
        price - the selected price of the ball
        material - the selected material of the ball
        size - the selected size of the ball
        treeDecorator - the tree to be decorated with the ball
